text: he; manusyare, tirccayayum ninnale nam oru anil ninnum oru pennil ninnumayi srsticcirikkunnu. ninnal an'yean'yam ariyentatin ninnale nam vividha samudayannalum geatrannalum akkukayum ceytirikkunnu. tirccayayum allahuvinre atutt ninnalil erravum adaraniyan ninnalil erravum dharm'manistha palikkunnavanakunnu. tirccayayum allahu sarvvajnanum suksmajnaniyumakunnu
